named-query.name: findCaseType
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM CaseType t WHERE (trim(t.typeId) = :typeId) ORDER BY t.typeId

named-query.name: countCaseTypes
named-query.query: SELECT count(t) FROM CaseType t WHERE (TRIM(t.typeId) = :typeId OR :typeId IS NULL) AND (CONCAT(' ', CONCAT(UPPER(t.description),' ')) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) >= :minChangeDateTime OR :minChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) <= :maxChangeDateTime OR :maxChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.typeId <> 'ACTA' AND t.typeId <> 'ACTI')

named-query.name: findCaseTypes
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM CaseType t WHERE (trim(t.typeId) = :typeId OR :typeId IS NULL) AND (CONCAT(' ', CONCAT(UPPER(t.description),' ')) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) >= :minChangeDateTime OR :minChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) <= :maxChangeDateTime OR :maxChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.typeId <> 'ACTA' AND t.typeId <> 'ACTI') ORDER BY t.typeId

named-query.name: listModifiedCaseTypes
named-query.query: SELECT t.typeId FROM CaseType t WHERE TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) >= :dateTime1 AND TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) < :dateTime2 ORDER BY t.typeId

named-query.name: countActaTypes
named-query.query: SELECT count(t) FROM CaseType t WHERE (trim(t.typeId) = :typeId OR :typeId IS NULL) AND (CONCAT(' ', CONCAT(UPPER(t.description),' ')) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) >= :minChangeDateTime OR :minChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) <= :maxChangeDateTime OR :maxChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.typeId = 'ACTA' OR t.typeId = 'ACTI')

named-query.name: findActaTypes
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM CaseType t WHERE (trim(t.typeId) = :typeId OR :typeId IS NULL) AND (CONCAT(' ', CONCAT(UPPER(t.description),' ')) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) >= :minChangeDateTime OR :minChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) <= :maxChangeDateTime OR :maxChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.typeId = 'ACTA' OR t.typeId = 'ACTI') ORDER BY t.typeId

named-query.name: loadTaulaConfig
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TaulaConfig t WHERE (trim(t.tccodi0)=trim(:tccodi0)) AND (trim(t.tccodi1)=trim(:tccodi1))

named-query.name: findTaulaConfig
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TaulaConfig t WHERE (trim(t.tccodi0)=trim(:tccodi0) OR :tccodi0 IS NULL) AND (trim(t.tccodi1) like :tccodi1 OR :tccodi1 IS NULL) AND (trim(t.tccodi2)=trim(:tccodi2) OR :tccodi2 IS NULL) AND (UPPER(trim(t.description)) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) ORDER BY t.tccodi0, t.tccodi1, t.tccodi2, t.description

named-query.name: countTaulaConfig
named-query.query: SELECT count(t) FROM TaulaConfig t WHERE (trim(t.tccodi0)=trim(:tccodi0) OR :tccodi0 IS NULL) AND (trim(t.tccodi1) like :tccodi1 OR :tccodi1 IS NULL) AND (trim(t.tccodi2)=trim(:tccodi2) OR :tccodi2 IS NULL) AND (UPPER(trim(t.description)) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL)

named-query.name: listModifiedTaulaConfig
named-query.query: SELECT t.tccodi1 FROM TaulaConfig t WHERE (trim(t.tccodi0)=trim(:tccodi0)) AND (trim(t.tccodi1) like :tccodi1 OR :tccodi1 IS NULL) AND TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) >= :dateTime1 AND TRIM(CONCAT(t.stddmod, t.stdhmod)) < :dateTime2 ORDER BY t.tccodi0

named-query.name: listCaseTypeVariables
named-query.query: SELECT va FROM Variable va WHERE va.caseTypeId = :caseTypeId ORDER BY va.varcod
